document.docAuthor: Burckhardt, Daniel, Ouvrard, David & Percy, Diana M.
document.masterDocTitle: An updated classification of the jumping plant-lice (Hemiptera: Psylloidea) integrating molecular and morphological evidence

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An updated classification of the jumping plant-lice (Hemiptera: Psylloidea) integrating molecular and morphological evidence

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Naturhistorisches Museum, Augustinergasse 2, 4001 Basel, Switzerland. ANSES, Plant Health Laboratory, Entomology and invasive plants unit, 755 avenue du campus Agropolis, CS 30016, 34988 Montferrier-sur-Lez Cedex, France. Department of Botany, University of British Columbia, 6270 University Boulevard, Vancouver V 6 T 1 Z 4, Canada.

subSubSection.paragraph:
type-species:
Labicria barbata Enderlein, 1918
by original designation and monotypy.

The type of the Brazilian
Labicria barbata
is destroyed (D. Burckhardt, unpubl.) and we have not seen any fresh material fitting the original description.
Cephalopsyllini Heslop-Harrison, 1960: 160; nomen nudum, no included genera.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Stigmaphalarini Vondráček, 1957: 140
; nomen nudum, no included genera; syn. of Aphalarini Löw, 1879 .

treatmentCitationGroup.treatmentCitation: Dentotriza Park & Taylor, 1996a: 177 ; nomen nudum, no included species.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Hispaniola Ramírez Gómez, 1956: 76
; nomen nudum, type species not designated; syn. of
Arytainilla Loginova, 1972
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Lindbergia Heslop-Harrison, 1951
: fig. 2a–b; nomen nudum, no included species, syn. of
Arytainilla Loginova, 1972
.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Lindbergiella Heslop-Harrison, 1961: 509
; nomen nudum, type species not designated; syn. of
Arytainilla Loginova, 1972
.

treatmentCitationGroup.treatmentCitation:
Loginoviana Mathur, 1975: 230 ; nomen nudum, no type designated and no description; syn. of
Ctenarytaina Ferris & Klyver, 1932
.
Metapaurocephala Heslop-Harrison, 1952: 966 ; nomen nudum, no type designated.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Neoacizzia Park & Taylor, 1996b: 177
; nomen nudum, no included species; syn. of
Acizzia
Heslop- Harrison, 1961.

Parapaurocephala Heslop-Harrison, 1952: 962
; nomen nudum, no description; syn. of
Microphyllurus Li, 2002
.

treatmentCitationGroup.treatmentCitation: Paraphyllolyma Heslop-Harrison, 1952: 966 ; nomen nudum, no type designated.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Peltapaurocephala Heslop-Harrison, 1952: 966
; nomen nudum, no description; syn. of
Padaukia Hollis & Martin, 1993
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Pennapsylla Froggatt, 1923
: pl. 2, fig. 11, nomen nudum, no type designated; syn. of
Cardiaspina Crawford, 1911
.

treatmentCitationGroup.treatmentCitation: Phacopteronella Heslop-Harrison, 1960: 504; nomen nudum, no description, no type designated.

Pseudotingidiforma Heslop-Harrison, 1952: 966 ; nomen nudum, no type designated; syn. of
Lisronia Loginova, 1976
.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Psyllia Kirkaldy, 1905: 268
; nomen nudum, no description; syn. of
Cacopsylla Ossiannilsson, 1970
.

treatmentCitationGroup.treatmentCitation:
Tingidiforma Heslop-Harrison, 1951: 27; nomen nudum; syn. of
Togepsylla Kuwayama, 1931
.
